text: TCDD DH3600 were diesel-hydraulic locomotive built for shunting operations on the Turkish State Railways. 38 units were built by Tüvasaş under licence from Maschinenbau Kiel (MaK). In 1980-81 the shunters were rebuilt with Cummins Diesel KT1150L engines. ==Other websites== * Trains of Turkey page on DH3600 Category:MaK locomotives Category:C locomotives
title: TCDD DH3600
